paramInformation.label: Association Led
paramInformation.description: Activates the central led. configuration used by masters io in order to identify the devices associated to their group2 during manual association process

paramInformation.label: Behavior of LED in Repose
paramInformation.description: Sets the central LED to 20% in order to find the device at night

paramInformation.label: Lock Input
paramInformation.description: Locks the local control of associated devices and controller. this configuration does not modifies the control via Z-Wave, where if a set is received it will retransmitted to all group 2 associated nodes

paramInformation.label: Reset Default
paramInformation.description: Write only parameter used to restore configurations or perform a completely restore default

paramInformation.label: Lock Manual Association
paramInformation.description: Enables or disables the manual association process

options.label: Hold press of 10sec to 30sec starts manual association of devices to group 2

paramInformation.label: Press Action
paramInformation.description: Defines the function performed by the device when keypad is pressed

options.label: Short press switches between the last power on and off (depending on the status of the associated control) by sending a Basic Set to 0x00 or 0xff to the associated nodes
Short press activates those associated by sending Basic Set to 0xff
Short press deactivates those associated by sending Basic Set to 0x00
Short press always turn on the associated nodes by sending a Basic Set to 0xff. press from 2sec to 10sec always turns off the associated nodes by sending a Basic Set to 0x00
When short press master inverts the load state via Basic Set, when the slider is enabled and load is on, multilevel sets are sent to modify the dimming value

paramInformation.label: Identify
paramInformation.description: Central LED performs a fast blink

paramInformation.label: Device State
paramInformation.description: Configuration used to know the device state and last active dimming value in case of act retransmitting values different from 0 or 0xff. this value is represented in hexadecimal. byte 0 informs about load state (0 load is off and 1 load is on) byte 1 informs about last active load value (0-0x63 or 0xff)

paramInformation.label: Lock Hold Press
paramInformation.description: Locks the major part of hold press effects in order to avoid undesired Z-Wave changes, associations or restores default. 0xff hold press from 2sec to 10 sec does not performs a node info. hold press of 10 to 30 does not performs a manual association process. hold press of 30sec restores configuration except lock hold press, and sends a node info in order to add or remove from Z-Wave network

paramInformation.label: Consult On Touch
paramInformation.description: This configuration has only effects when there is only 1 associated node in group 2. is used to set if master has to be always informed about the controlled device state or it is consulted when user touches the keypad

options.label: Device must receive reports about controlled device state

paramInformation.label: Send Central Scene
paramInformation.description: Disables the sending of central scene notifications to avoid perform 2 actions at same time (central scene action and group 2 action)

options.label: Device does not sends central scene notifications

metadata.reset:
When the pushbutton is released after a press of (30sec<T) the device will perform a factory default values operation, excluding it from network and reset the configuration parameters.

Main LED will perform 1 Blink with 5 sec.

Please use this procedure only when the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable.
